title: nAgagAndhArI rAganutE
sahitya:
nAgagAndhArI rAganutE nagajAnanditE mAmava


anupallavi

 nAgarAja vinutE surahitE vAgIshAdi guruguha vanditE 
bhAgavatAdi nuta paradEvatE parama tatvArttha bOdhitE shivE


caraNam   parama shAnta svarUpAkArE pAda pankajE padma karE niratishaya 
sukhakarE surucirE sasharacApa pAshAnkusha dharE
